item.title: UGC videos for product video ads (girls) - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a UGC content creator to produce high-quality video ads (each of under 60 seconds) for 4 products in the skin care and wellness industry. Products like face serum, face mask, breast oil, Weight gainer, libido booster,  bum and back cream. As a content creator, you will be responsible for conceptualizing, shooting, editing, and delivering engaging video content that highlights the benefits and features of our products. This role requires a strong understanding of UGC trends and the ability to create content that resonates with our target audience.

    Key skills:
    - Video production
    - Video editing
    - Storyboarding
    - Content ideation
    - Creative direction
    - Knowledge of skin care and wellness industry

    Time frame: Under 60 Second


Budget: $50
Posted On: June 24, 2024 09:14 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Short Video Ad, Video Production, Video Commercial, Video Advertising, Video Ad, Product Ad Campaign
Skills: Short Video Ad, Video Production, Video Commercial, Video Advertising, Video Ad, Product Ad Campaign
Country: India

item.title: Looking for 2d Stick Figure Animator - Upwork
item.description:
I’m looking for an experienced animator to join my production team on a growing youtube channel.

Duties:
You’ll be given a voice-over audio file and a script with detailed animator instructions. Your job will be to create stick figure drawings, scenes, and animations to produce an engaging and fun-to-watch video.

Requirements to Apply:

- Adobe Animate, Premiere Pro
- Good English communication skills
- Artistic ability to copy a specific style of illustration
- Ability to draw quickly for a quick turnaround
- Attention to detail
- Good communication
- Be willing to ask questions to clarify instructions if you don’t understand
- Turn in work on time

The videos will need to be in a similar style as below.:

https://www.youtube.com/@Kelevins
https://www.youtube.com/@ChatHistory
https://www.youtube.com/@TrustMeBroOfficial

Application Process:
- Submit your application with examples of work.
- A sample will be required in the next step.

Start your application with “Stickman” to ensure that you have read the job post fully. We will share further requirements in the next stage.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 24, 2024 09:13 UTC
Category: 2D Animation
Skills:Animated Explainer, Adobe Animate, Animation, 2D Animation, Video Editing, Explainer Video, Motion Graphics
Skills: Animated Explainer, Adobe Animate, Animation, 2D Animation, Video Editing, Explainer Video, Motion Graphics
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Freelance Video Editor and YouTube Specialist - Upwork
item.description:
Job Title: Freelance Video Editor and YouTube Specialist

Description:

We are an e-commerce business in the pet products market, seeking a talented and experienced freelance video editor and YouTube specialist to enhance our digital presence on YouTube. Our goal is to engage with our audience, increase brand awareness, and drive traffic to our website. We currently have 50k YouTube subscribers.

Responsibilities:

-Conduct a comprehensive audit of our YouTube channel to identify areas for improvement.
-Develop and implement a content strategy tailored to our brand and audience, focusing on increasing product sales.
-Edit 30-minute YouTube Live sessions into entertaining and engaging shorter videos.
-Create multiple short videos from long-form content to promote the full videos and drive engagement.
-Optimize videos for SEO and platform-specific best practices.
-Monitor video performance and adjust strategies based on data and feedback.
-Collaborate with the team to align video content with overall marketing goals.
-Provide actionable recommendations to improve video content quality and engagement.

Requirements:

-Proven experience as a Video Editor with a strong portfolio.
-Experience conducting YouTube audits and developing improvement strategies.
-Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, After Effects).
-Strong understanding of YouTube algorithms, SEO, and best practices.
-Excellent attention to detail and organizational skills.
-Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
-Creative mindset with fresh ideas.
-Strong communication skills.

Desired Attributes:

-Ability to produce fun, engaging content with great edits.
-Experience advising on video content quality and growth strategies.
-Familiarity with current trends and successful video strategies in the industry.

Application Instructions:

-Please submit the following to be considered for the role:
Your resume.

-A brief cover letter outlining your YouTube experience and strategy approach.

-Examples of successful YouTube campaigns you have managed, including metrics and outcomes.

-A proposed content strategy for our YouTube channel (www.guineadad.com), focusing on converting viewers into customers.

Applications without these components will not be considered.

Hourly Range: $30.00-$100.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 08:54 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:YouTube Shorts, YouTube Video, Instagram Reels, TikTok Video, Instagram Story, Color Grading, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Intro & Outro
Skills: YouTube Shorts, YouTube Video, Instagram Reels, TikTok Video, Instagram Story, Color Grading, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Intro & Outro
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Project Specialist - Upwork
item.description:
A leading academic institution in Abu Dhabi, specializing in astronomy research, seeks a dynamic and creative independent contractor for a summer project. The Center for Astrophysics and Space Science (CASS) is composed of a unique combination of theorists, observers, and instrument builders dedicated to understanding the nature of the cosmos. To compliment the research, CASS continues to build upon the outreach program by developing public programming and by producing community based events. These programs aim to ignite scientific curiosity and promote scientific ideas, especially in space science.

The role involves archiving and editing media footage, creating engaging content, and developing a robust social media strategy to launch our presence on TikTok and Instagram by early Fall 2024.

Responsibilities:
• Media Management & Editing: Archive and organize existing media, curate and edit media to produce high-quality, social engaging videos and graphics.
• Content Strategy Development: Draft and execute a comprehensive social media plan tailored for TikTok and Instagram, focusing on reaching and engaging our target audience.
• Content Creation & Scheduling: Create and manage a content calendar, and successfully launch on TikTok and potentially Instagram between September-October, 2024.
• Collaboration & Communication: Work closely with our team to align content with our mission and objectives, ensuring timely completion of all project deliverables.
• Experience & Skills Application: Utilize experience with small businesses or academic institutions, demonstrating proficiency in design and video or sound editing tools to enhance our social media presence.
• Post launch: Advise on strategies for building engagement, monitor social media platforms and respond to inquiries; Track social media engagement to identify high-performing ideas; analyze analytics to gauge successful campaigns, ensure brand consistency.

Qualifications:
• Understanding of social media trends and relevant influencers.
• Proven experience in social media management, particularly in launching new platforms.
• Background in video editing, graphic design, and sound editing.
• Previous work with small businesses or academic institutions preferred.
• Ability to work under timelines and deliver high-quality results.
• Availability to complete the project over the summer and support the social media launch in early Fall 2024.
• Good written and verbal communication skills
Preferred skills:
• An interest in science and astronomy

Budget: $2,500
Posted On: June 24, 2024 08:47 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Account Setup, Social Media Marketing Strategy, Instagram, TikTok, Social Media Content, Social Media Content Creation, Marketing Strategy
Skills: Social Media Account Setup, Social Media Marketing Strategy, Instagram, TikTok, Social Media Content, Social Media Content Creation, Marketing Strategy
Country: United Arab Emirates
click to apply

item.title: Need Video Editor for My Online Course - Upwork
item.description:
1. I provide my course video(say 5 hours) you need to provide me 3 hours of edited video. You need to put attractive Text, Stock Vidoes etc to make the entire video as professional. This is STOCK MARKET COURSE VIDEO.
2. Content -  I provide my recorded video (raw footage)
3. You need to add whatever makes it valuable for viewers and prepare/edit this video to final COURSE.
4. Approximately you need to provide the output in a month.
5. No need to put too much of attractive but your editing should simple and effective.
6. Budget $100/ per month.
7. Show me your works/portfolio before proceeding.
8. Preferred Talent candidate is from India and communication in English.
9. If you read all the above 9 points then start the conversation with "YES, I UNDERSTAND".

Reference video link:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdc6ObxhdQ8eZIFquU2xolA

Any doubts ask me in message.

Budget: $100

item.title: Content Marketing for Video Production & Video Marketing - Upwork
item.description:
All spam will be ignored.

We are looking for a someone who is knowledgable in corporate & events video production, to manage the growth of our organic search & social media awareness our video production company.

Bonus if you are able to write blog content, and create infographics for social media (LinkedIn, X, Instagram).

We are looking to start off bundling all the topics and publish them once a week.

Responsibilities:
- Come up with a strategy of topics meant for the correct audience.
- Research on ideas and competitors.
- Keyword analysis
- Ensure content is accurate and relevant with the business.
- Create the brief & outlines of topics
- Bonus: write the blogs & produce the infographics

Requirements:
- Strong understanding on video production & video marketing.
- Ability to relate and understand target audience and ideate from their perspective.
- Strong written communication skills.

We are only looking for 1 person, here's how to be shortlisted of being selected:
- Send in a maximum of 5 samples related to the topic - higher chances if you have something close to video marketing or video production
- Respond to all the questions properly, explaining why you are interested in writing about these figures

Please type your favorite movie or TV show at the beginning or end of your proposal. (we will ignore your application if you do not respond - this is to know that you have read the details)

NOTE:
- No agencies.
- We go by a monthly cost instead of hourly cost. With an opportunity for monthly cost after a minimum of 3-5 successful collaborations.
- Please indicate your project cost, if you have a revision limit, and how much an additional revision will cost.

Budget: $400
Posted On: June 24, 2024 08:32 UTC
Category: Content Strategy
Skills:Content Planning, Content Strategy, Market Research, Research & Strategy, English
Skills: Content Planning, Content Strategy, Market Research, Research & Strategy, English
Country: Singapore
click to apply

item.title: Creative Explainer Video Creator - Upwork
item.description:
Creative Explainer Video Creator Wanted!!!

PORTFOLIO IS A MUST!!!

We're searching for a creative and tech-savvy Explainer Video Creator to join our team. Your role will involve crafting engaging and informative videos that break down complex ideas into simple, easy-to-understand visuals and narratives. Ideal candidates will have a strong background in graphic design, animation, and video editing, with a knack for storytelling and a keen eye for detail. If you're passionate about turning information into captivating visual stories and have experience with video production tools, we'd love to see your work.

This project requires you to work with zoom screen sharing.  If you are not ok with working with zoom screen sharing, please do not apply.

Work Hours 11:30AM to 6:00PM PST (Los Angeles Time) Monday-Friday (Weekend Optional)

Hourly Range: $10.00

item.title: Creative Video Editor for Educational Content - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor who can help us edit educational videos in a creative and engaging way. The ideal candidate should have experience in editing educational content and a strong understanding of storytelling techniques. They should be able to effectively use video editing software to enhance the overall quality of the videos and make them more visually appealing. It is essential that the editor has a good eye for detail and can work efficiently under tight deadlines.

Required skills:
    - Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
    - Strong understanding of storytelling and narrative techniques
    - Ability to create visually appealing and engaging content
    - Good eye for detail and ability to work efficiently under tight deadlines

Monthly Requirements
- 40 Educational Reels (Refer for educational video https://www.instagram.com/rajshamani/reels/?hl=en & https://www.instagram.com/labourlawadvisor/reels/?hl=en)
- 40 Composition reels (Refer for video Sample https://www.instagram.com/sportena_surat/)
- 2 Podcast edits
- 10 Long youtube video

Budget: $100

Category: Video Editing

- 40 Educational Reels (Refer for educational video https://www.instagram.com/rajshamani/reels/?hl=en & https://www.instagram.com/labourlawadvisor/reels/?hl=en)
- 40 Composition reels (Refer for video Sample https://www.instagram.com/sportena_surat/)
- 2 Podcast edits
- 10 Long youtube video

Budget: $100

item.title: Looking for Video Editor for Vlog - Upwork
item.description:
Hi all,

I am doing a road trip for July and want to make a series on it.

I am planning to do 14 videos for this project.

Vlog video will include cuts, subtitles for some footage, face blur some BGM.

Please include pricing in your proposal, looking for flat rate per video.

Process:
1. I will provide footage + Editor's Notes
2. You edit a provide Draft
3. I will provide Revision Notes
4. Repeat Steps 2-3 until we have finished video (typically takes 2-3 revisions)

I have one video ready to test out. Reach out to me for more info!

Hourly Range: $10.00-$15.00

item.title: Feature film - audio mix, dialogue editing, cleanup, foley. - Upwork
item.description:
I’m in post production on a microbudget feature film (drama) which requires mixing - including dialogue editing/cleanup, atmos and foley. 80 mins duration.

There is some challenging dialogue in places - though actors are covered with booms and lav mics - there is handling noise, rustle and reverb. You need to be an expert in audio cleanup, using tools like Izotope.

AAFs and a video file would be supplied. Atmos tracks provided for each scene.

Needs mixing to broadcast quality. Please only apply if you have experience with this kind of work on a narrative project.

Deliverables are the mix project file, stereo mix (internet and broadcast loudness versions), M+E track and individual stems.

Note: please quote accurately for the job when applying.

Budget: $600
Posted On: June 24, 2024 08:21 UTC
Category: Audio Editing
Skills:Audio Restoration, Dialogue Editing, Audio Post Production, Audio Editing, Audio Production, Sound Mixing, Music & Sound Design, Audio Effects
Skills: Audio Restoration, Dialogue Editing, Audio Post Production, Audio Editing, Audio Production, Sound Mixing, Music & Sound Design, Audio Effects
Country: Australia

item.title: Looking for a LONG TERM Video Editor for my Brands, create converting Facebook Video ADs - Upwork
item.description:
You NEED to have experience with AI tools such as Midourney, ElevenLabs, Creatify.

You must understand how to create captivating ADs that convert for different brands in the beauty and supplement niche.

You must understand the concept of marketing angles and how to SELL to a customer.

There is a huge opportunity for growth if you are hired with bonuses and raises if the video ADs perform well.

Everything is based on performance.

Your effort won't go unnoticed.

I am a very giving and generous employer.

I want you part of my team.

Your success is my success and vice versa.

I predominately advertise on Facebook so you need to have an understanding of the Facebook policy and be able to follow rules and regulations and if ADs get rejected, you are able to make revisions in a timely manner.

Speed is very important to me.

You need to be someone who doesn't make simple spelling errors as well.

I need someone who works quick and efficiently.

LET ME KNOW COST OF EACH VIDEO, (videos don't need a certain time limit, as long as they get the message across of the body (intro, body, cta) then it's great)

I will not be replying if you don't provide pricing per video and your portfolio,

thanks.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 08:19 UTC
Category: Logo Design
Skills:Video Editing, Facebook
Skills: Video Editing, Facebook
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: HeyGen Video Producer - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented video producer to create engaging and high-quality videos on HeyGen. As our video producer, you will be responsible for conceptualizing, filming, editing, and delivering videos that align with our brand and target audience. The ideal candidate must have a strong understanding of storytelling, video production techniques, and must be proficient in using HeyGen's video editing features.

   Responsibilities:
   - Collaborate with the marketing team to develop video concepts and scripts
   - Edit videos using HeyGen's video editing tools
   - Ensure videos are on-brand and deliver key messaging effectively
  
   Requirements:
   - Proven experience in producing high-quality videos
   - Proficiency in using HeyGen's video editing features
   - Strong storytelling and visual communication skills
   - Ability to work efficiently and meet deadlines

If you have high attention to detail in video editing, and have expertise in HeyGen, we would love to hear from you. Please provide samples of your previous work and a brief description of your experience with HeyGen.

Hourly Range: $18.00-$35.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 08:19 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Video Editing, Video Commercial, Videography, Explainer Video
Skills: Video Production, Video Editing, Video Commercial, Videography, Explainer Video
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

Im looking for a good video editor for my youtube channels. The videos need to be engaging, not much the same footage, good edits and good effects, and there have to be shown what the voice over says. It will be in the celebrity/royal people niche.

item.title: Thai Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Job Opportunity: Remote Video Editors for Thai YouTube Channel
Channel Type: Educational and Entertaining Content
Video Length: 20-30 minutes per video
Employment Type: Long-term, Remote
Job Description:
We are seeking 5 talented and dedicated video editors to join our team. This is a fantastic opportunity to work on engaging and educational content for our Thai YouTube channel. After the first two topics, successful candidates will be offered a full-time position.
Responsibilities:
Edit videos to create compelling and informative content.
Collaborate with the team to ensure consistency and quality.
Meet deadlines
Requirements:
Proficiency in Adobe Premiere Pro.
Access to a PC with a monitor.
Commitment to a long-term partnership.
Ability to work remotely and independently.

item.title: Hype reel - Upwork
item.description:
Background: we recently rebranded a small industrial business and want to do a video to summarise the work done in an exciting way for their internal brand launch for staff.

Length: not important but I suggest under 1 minute.

Format:  mp4 1080p landscape

Music is required.  Upbeat. Energetic.
This will only be used internally so no licensing needed. I'm happy to make music suggestions.


All the assets to use (including brand guidelines and logo) are in here  Ideally I’d like all of this included.

https://permissionmarketing.sharepoint.com/:f:/g/Ev45V6kmappBj2CRxTN9pRwBg9fM0jR025yPLxyXfLDoDA?e=SY3BUt

The main purpose is to show all the brand design work but there's a folder in there called 'images' that can be used at will (we don’t need to use all of them)

we don’t have any video, so you’ll need to get energy from adding moves, zooms, builds etc using these assets….

References
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n4eQ7-j1LUA&t=59s
https://www.matthewroberts.co/hypereel

As well as the graphic assets, some words than can appear throughout are:

ACESS
INSPECT
REPAIR

Other words that can splash on:

NEW LOGO
NEW LOOK
NEW WEBSITE

FYI the new website (not yet live) is here https://metro.insideoutgroup.com.au/

Video title: Preparing for the next 30 years!

I have a week to do this.

1st milestone will be a sample.
2nd ,milestone a rough edit
2rd final edit with music

Please only send me samples of your work that uses flat graphics like this brief (I'm not interested in edits of live footage), thanks


Budget: $250
Posted On: June 24, 2024 08:16 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Music Video, Motion Graphics
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Music Video, Motion Graphics
Country: Australia
click to apply
